title: Question 3
description: How long is the vesting schedule?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The vesting schedule is designed so that there is not a giant cliff waiting over users heads at a specific point. The tokens allocated to the Founders, Seed Investors, and Advisors are locked in a smart contract that releases the tokens **on a weekly basis over a two year period**. The vesting period started with the launch of the Yield Farming mechanism. 

[Learn more](https://github.com/BarnBridge/BarnBridge-Whitepaper#311-fair-vesting)
